metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28965 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The REXML gem before 3.2.5 in Ruby before 2.6.7, 2.7.x before 2.7.3, and 3.x before 3.0.1 does not properly address XML round-trip issues. An incorrect document can be produced after parsing and serializing.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-28965` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.7 - 2.7.3-2ubuntu1
ruby2.7 - 2.7.3-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-rexml package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
ruby2.7 package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.3-2ubuntu1').
